com.jcabi.jdbc

Class ColumnOutcome<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcabi.jdbc.ColumnOutcome<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Outcome<Collection<T>>

    public final class ColumnOutcome<T>
extends Object
implements Outcome<Collection<T>>
    Outcome that returns first column.

    Use it when you need the first column: 

     Collection&lgt;Long> salaries = new JdbcSession(source)
   .sql("SELECT salary FROM user")
   .select(new ColumnOutcome<Long>(Long.class));

    Supported types are: String, Long, Boolean, Byte, Date, and Utc.

    Since:
    0.13
    Version:
    $Id: 8fd840d390ed211c3bc81295cf4fbf7095ff0042 $
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor256@gmail.com)
